values: I wish I knew how to explain to the Irish drinkers side of my family that alcohol & liquor is like kryptonite to my physical healthiness without hurting their feelings or insulting them. They can't accept that the two years I spent imbibing alcoholic beverages regularly coincide with my becoming too sick to work or go to school anymore. All they see and remember is me leaving Worcester after graduating from high school and then being diagnosed with sitises and isms. I don't want one drink or one sip & I don't want to have to explain why or feel uncomfortable refusing anymore. too bad I'm too chicken shit & worried about ridiculous repercussions to say so.

for some reason when i sleep i stretch myself into a much longer person than i actually am. and i sleep like the dead so jim can never wake me up to get me to shrink myself. i told him to shake me until i responded but for some reason he refuses to use force to disturb my sleep. also, hobsoncat does the same thing with the stretching out that i do, except i have no doubts that he is much ruder and obnoxious about it-i know for a fact he does NOT sleep like the dead. it didnt matter much in the winter becos we were always cold enough to sleep on top of each other in a warm trio formation, but now its summer and it gets sticky and hobson attacks us if we close the door so we cant sleep naked. this is really a major dilemma becos now jim takes naps at 4PM and gets up at 9PM and stays up so late i start passing out on the couch and then end up going to bed alone which sucks becos i dont sleep well alone, and even if hobson decides to come to bed when i go he always wants to play for twenty minutes first so he jumps around on the bed until i pay attention to him then finally hell fall asleep but as soon as im ABOUT to fall asleep he wakes up becos jim is still in the living room and he needs to know what jim is doing without him. but its hard to get mad at either of them becos they both use cute faces when they know im getting mad, and they always know. so what the hell am i supposed to do here. its not a pressing matter or anything but compared to the problems ive compained about before, this one is just ridiculous. i think im living the good life.

relationships are constant battles.
you compete to prove who likes who more and then who can keep their affection a better secret. always always always its been assumed that the girl likes the boy more but pretends to think she keeps her affection a good secret and he has no idea even though she knows he knows she likes him more. if a boy accidently confesses that he thinks he likes her more the balance of a working equation is completely thrown off and the girl suffers from a severe drop in your heart makes mine flutter levels. if after some critical break periods the relationsip is recovered, the girl can glance back at the near fatal disrupture of balance as a victory on her part and take pride in the event by smiling softly when his back is turned because no matter what he does, that one victory is forever sweeter. if the relationship does not recover, however, the boy is somewhat disgusting for the remainder of their aquaintance. the majority of the time the disgust can be so frequent the friendship collapses immediately, but occassionally the disgust will only occur once every few months or rarer and the duo can remain bffls.

sometimes also the relationship is thrown out of whack purely because one of the party is a complete douche.
